issue.title: [Testing] Add partitioned CSV file to arrow-testing repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6102](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6102). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I need to add a partitioned CSV file to arrow-testing for use in parallel query unit tests in DataFusion

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6102?focusedCommentId=16898292) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I will have the Rust unit tests dynamically create partitioned files instead
